Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Cairns (Cairns), Villa Vaucluse Apartments of Cairns is minutes from Cairns Civic Theatre and The Cultural Place. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Jute Theatre and Center of Contemporary Arts.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and microwaves, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Cairns (Cairns), Villa Vaucluse Apartments of Cairns is minutes from Cairns Civic Theatre and The Cultural Place. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Jute Theatre and Center of Contemporary Arts.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cairns Civic Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
The Cultural Place - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Jute Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Center of Contemporary Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kick Contemporary Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Cairns Night Markets - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Cairns Esplanade - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cairns Regional Gallery - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cairns Central Shopping Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Muddy's Playground - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Esplanade Lagoon - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
ZOO To You HQ Wildlife Discovery Centre - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Reef Hotel Casino - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Reef Fleet Terminal - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Cairns Rainforest Dome - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Villa Vaucluse Apartments of Cairns is Cairns, QLD (CNS-Cairns Intl.) - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
